00034 #ifndef MSQVERTEX_HPP
00035 #define MSQVERTEX_HPP
00036 
00037 #include "Mesquite.hpp"
00038 #include "Vector3D.hpp"
00039 
00040 namespace MESQUITE_NS
00041 {
00051   class MESQUITE_EXPORT MsqVertex : public Vector3D
00052    {
00053    public:
00055      MsqVertex(double x, double y, double z) 
00056        : Vector3D(x, y, z), vertexBitFlags(0)
00057        {}
00058      
00060      MsqVertex(const Vector3D &vec) 
00061        : Vector3D(vec), vertexBitFlags(0)
00062        {}
00063      
00065      MsqVertex() 
00066        : Vector3D(0,0,0), vertexBitFlags(0)
00067        {}
00068 
00070      MsqVertex(const MsqVertex& rhs) 
00071        : Vector3D(rhs), vertexBitFlags(rhs.vertexBitFlags)
00072        {}
00073 
00075      MsqVertex& operator=(const Vector3D& rhs)
00076        { Vector3D::operator=(rhs);
00077          return *this; }
00078      
00079        // This allows for 8 flag bits.
00080        // I don't think we'll want more than that (yet).
00081      typedef unsigned char FlagMask;
00082      
00088      enum FlagMaskID
00089      {
00090        MSQ_HARD_FIXED  = 1<<0, 
00091        MSQ_DEPENDENT   = 1<<1, 
00092        MSQ_CULLED      = 1<<2, 
00093        MSQ_PATCH_FIXED = 1<<3, 
00094        MSQ_MARK        = 1<<4, 
00095        MSQ_FIXED = (MSQ_HARD_FIXED|MSQ_CULLED|MSQ_PATCH_FIXED)
00096      };
00098      bool is_free_vertex() const
00099        { return (vertexBitFlags & (MSQ_HARD_FIXED|MSQ_PATCH_FIXED)) == 0; }
00100      
00101      void set_soft_fixed_flag()
00102        { vertexBitFlags|=MSQ_CULLED; }
00103      
00104      void remove_soft_fixed_flag()
00105        { vertexBitFlags &= (~MSQ_CULLED); }
00106      
00107      void set_hard_fixed_flag()
00108        { vertexBitFlags|=MSQ_HARD_FIXED; }
00109      
00110      void set_vertex_flag(FlagMaskID flag)
00111        { vertexBitFlags|=flag; }
00112      
00113      void remove_vertex_flag(FlagMaskID flag)
00114        { vertexBitFlags &= (~flag); }
00115      
00116      bool is_flag_set(FlagMaskID flag) const
00117        { return (vertexBitFlags & flag) != 0; }
00118     
00119      FlagMask get_flags() const
00120       { return vertexBitFlags; }
00121     
00122      FlagMask& flags() 
00123       { return vertexBitFlags; }
00124     
00125      void set_flags( FlagMask flags )
00126       { vertexBitFlags = flags; }
00127      
00128    private:
00129      FlagMask vertexBitFlags;
00130    };
00131 
00132 } //namespace
00133   
00134 
00135 #endif // MsqVertex_hpp
